name: dishWashing_start
description: This function is used to start the dishwashing function on a specified SmartThings dishwasher.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the dishwasher is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the dishwasher is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the dishwasher on which the dishwashing function needs to be started.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the dishwasher on which the dishwashing function needs to be started.
